quote: Michael...Michael got bitten. And now he's a vampire. But he doesn't remember becoming one, and that's a big problem. So if you see him, don't, you know, hug. He bites. He doesn't mean it, though.
quote_letters: MICHAELMICHAEL GOT BITTEN AND NOW HES A VAMPIRE BUT HE DOESNT REMEMBER BECOMING ONE AND THATS A BIG PROBLEM SO IF YOU SEE HIM DONT YOU KNOW HUG HE BITES HE DOESNT MEAN IT THOUGH
